se:Description.se:Title: Special And Rare Metals Default Style
se:Description.se:Abstract: The size of each symbol is related to the classification defined for each commodity (or group of commodities). The classification (A, B, C, D: A=very large B=large C=Medium D = small) is defined with the commodities code-list (see Annex F).
